page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: {The Life of a Farmer's Wife. As well as being a housewife and mother I have to be able to turn my hand to many farm jobs.e.g. handling cattle,driving tractors for many different jobs,moving corn,stacking hay and straw bales, helping with general building and maintenance jobs.bookkeeping and geneal office work. I have to be prepared to do these jobs at a minutes notice fitting housework around them. {The Life of a Farmer's Son. From 28th May to 20th June I help with the silage.Mum drives the tractor up & down the fields,Dad drives the tractor with the forage harvester on the back. That picks up the grass,chops it,blows it into the trailer until full.Dad un- hooks it,Mum changes full for empty & takes silage to the silo,where it is rolled down for winter cattle food.
